T02prmosubu:1: praṇamya pūrvaṃ jagati pradhānaṃ duḥkhālayottīrṇam anantapāram* /
T02prmosubu:14: nirvṛte mayi yuṣmākam eṣa śāstety abhiṣṭutaḥ // 7 //
T02prmosubu:23: buddhānāṃ sukham utpādaḥ sukhā dharmasya dhīṣaṇā sukhā saṃghasya sāmagrī śramaṇānāṃ tapaḥ sukham* // 9 //
T02prmosubu:24: sukhaṃ darśanam āryāṇāṃ saṃvāso 'pi satā sukhaḥ /
T02prmosubu:25: adarśanena bālānāṃ nityam eva sukhaṃ bhavet* // 10 //
T02prmosubu:26: sukhaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ śīlavantaḥ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭā bahuśrutāḥ /
T02prmosubu:28: sukhā nadī sukhaṃ tīrthaṃ sukhaṃ dharmajito jataḥ /
T02prmosubu:30: sukho hi vāsaḥ kṛtaniścayānāṃ jitendriyāṇāṃ ca bahuśrutānām* /
T02prmosubu:31: śānteṣv araṇyeṣu jarāṃ gatānāṃ vaneṣu nirvāpitayauvanānām* // 13 //
T02prmosubu:32: nirgatam āyuṣmanto grīṣmāṇāṃ yāvat tāvad avaśiṣṭam* /
T02prmosubu:36: apramādādhigatāhi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhir iti vā apy evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kuśalā dharmā bodhipakṣyāḥ /
T02prmosubu:38: anāgatānām āyuṣmantaś chandapariśuddhiṃ cārocayata ārocitāṃ ca pravedayata /
T02prmosubu:39: praṇamya śākyasiṃhāya bhūtvā hy asmai kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
T02prmosubu:40: prātimokṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi vinayaṃ tac chṛṇotu naḥ // 14 //
T02prmosubu:41: śrutvā ca tat karotv atra yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā /
T02prmosubu:43: yatnād drutaṃ satataṃ yaś ca cittahayaṃ mukhavacaneṣu anusārayati /
T02prmosubu:44: prātimokṣakhalīnam api sadṛśaṃ śatakaṇṭakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ yenātividhyate // 16
T02prmosubu:45: mahātmanaḥ ye vacanamātreṇa yathābhāgān na nivartante /
T02prmosubu:47: yeṣāṃ tu khalīnam idaṃ na vidyate nāpi antaḥkāmaṃ /
T02prmosubu:49: śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ adya saṃghasya poṣadhaḥ cāturdaśikaḥ pāṃcadaśiko vā (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee 7) sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghasya poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśayed eṣā
T02prmosubu:51: poṣadhaṃ vayam āyuṣman kariṣyāmaḥ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam uddeśāmaḥ /
T02prmosubu:54: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca vayam āyuṣmataḥ pariśuddhān vedayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02prmosubu:55: yathāpi pratyekaṃ pṛṣṭasya bhikṣor vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam evaṃ evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvaṇaṃ bhavati /
T02prmosubu:56: yaḥ punar bhikṣur evaṃrūpāyāṃ bhikṣuparṣadi yāvat trir apy anuśrāvyamāne smaran satīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādo 'sya bhavati /
T02prmosubu:57: saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaḥ khalv āyuṣmantaḥ antarāyiko dharma ukto bhagavatā /
T02prmosubu:58: tasmāt smaratā bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhāpekṣeṇa satī āpattir āviṣkartavyā /
T02prmosubu:59: āviṣkṛtenāsya phāsu bhavati nāviṣkṛtena na bhavati /
T02prmosubu:62: dvir api trir api pṛcchāmi -- kaccit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
T02prmosubu:63: atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
T02prmosubu:65: ime khalu āyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti
T02prmosubu:66: Pār.1 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsājīvasamāpannaḥ śikṣām apratyākhyāya śikṣādaurbalyam anāviṣkṛtyābrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratisevate antatas tiryagyonigatayāpi sārdhaṃ, ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
T02prmosubu:67: Pār.2 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur grāmagatam araṇyagataṃ vā
T02prmosubu:68: pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātam ādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā rājamātro vā hanyād vā saṃbadhnīyād vā pravāsayed vā evaṃ cainaṃ
T02prmosubu:69: vadet* -- tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si steno 'sīty evaṃrūpaṃ adattaṃ bhikṣuḥ ādadita, ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājayiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
T02prmosubu:70: Pār.3 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur manuṣyaṃ vā manuṣyavigrahaṃ
T02prmosubu:72: śastraṃ vainām ādhārayec chastradhārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeta maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ
T02prmosubu:74: evaṃ cainaṃ vadet* -- haṃbho puruṣa kiṃ tava pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bho puruṣa jīvitād varam iti cintānumataiś cittasaṃkalpair anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayen maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya anusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryād ayam api bhikṣuḥ
T02prmosubu:76: Pār.4 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann asantam asaṃvidyamānam anuttaramanuṣyadharmam alamārya viśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā darśanaṃ sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyād idaṃ jānāmīdaṃ paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno
T02prmosubu:77: viśuddhiṃ prakṣyaivaṃ vaded ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto 'vocaṃ jānāmīty apaśyāmīti riktaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāvyapalapanam anyatrābhimānāt* ayam api bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
T02prmosubu:78: uddiṣṭā mayāyuṣmantaś catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā yeṣāṃ bhikṣur anyatamānyatamam āpattim adhyāpatya na labhate bhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsaṃ bhogaṃ vā yathāpūrvaṃ ca tathāpaścāt pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyaḥ /
T02prmosubu:79: tatrāham āyuṣmantaḥ paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
T02prmosubu:80: dvir api trir api paripṛcchāmi -- kaścit sthātra pariśuddhāḥ
T02prmosubu:81: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
T02prmosubu:82: saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmāḥ ime khalv āyuṣmantas trayodaśa saṃghāvaśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśam āgacchanti /
T02prmosubu:83: SA.1 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) saṃcintya śukravisṛṣṭir anyatra svapnāntarāt saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:84: SA.2 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur avalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeta hastagrahaṇaṃ vā
T02prmosubu:85: bāhugrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatamānyatamasya vā aṅgapratyaṅgasaṃsparśanaṃ vā aṅgamarśanaṃ svīkuryāt saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:86: SA.3 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhulayā pāpikayā asabhyayā maithunopasaṃhitayā vācā ābhāṣeta yathāpi tāṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ SA.4 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur avadalavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya purastād ātmanaḥ kāyaparicaryāyā saṃvarṇayed etad agraṃ mātṛsvasaḥ paricaryāṇāṃ yaduta mādṛśaṃ bhikṣuṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmāṇaṃ brahmacāriṇam anena dharmeṇa paricared yaduta maithunopasaṃhitena
T02prmosubu:88: SA.5 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeta striyaṃ vā puruṣamatena puruṣaṃ vā strīmatena jāyātvena vā jāritvena vā antatas tatkṣaṇikāyām api saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:89: SA.6 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) svayaṃ yācitā bhikṣuṇā kuṭiṃ kārayitvā asvāmikām
T02prmosubu:91: tatredaṃ kuṭyāḥ pramāṇaṃ dairghyeṇa dvādaśa vitastayaḥ sugatavitastyā tīryak saptāntarataḥ
T02prmosubu:93: abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavyam anārambhaṃ saparikramam* /
T02prmosubu:94: sārambhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparākrame svayaṃ yācitāṃ kuṭiṃ kārayed asvāmikām ātmoddeśakāṃ bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstu darśanāya anabhinītair bhikṣubhiḥ adarśitavāstuni pramāṇaṃ vātikramet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:95: SA.7 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) mahallakaṃ punar bhikṣuḥ vihāraṃ kārayamānāḥ sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo 'bhihitavyā
T02prmosubu:97: ataḥ abhinītair bhikṣubhir vāstu draṣṭavam anāraṃbhaṃ
T02prmosubu:99: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣur vāstuny aparikrame mahantaṃ vihāraṃ kārayitvā yat sasvāmikaṃ saṃghoddeśakaṃ bhikṣūṃś ca nābhinayed vāstudarśanāya saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:100: SA.8 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ
T02prmosubu:101: bhikṣuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇānudhvaṃsayed apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā amūlakam eva svādhikaraṇaṃ bhaved bhikṣuś ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed dveṣeṇāvocam iti saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:102: SA.9 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣur dviṣṭoddeśād apratītaḥ śuddhaṃ
T02prmosubu:103: bhikṣuṃ anyasya vā anyathābhāgīyasya adhikaraṇasya kañcid eva leśamātraṃ dharmam upādāya pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃsayed apy evainaṃ brahmacaryāc cyāvayeyam iti tasya ca apareṇa samayena samanuyujyamānasya vā samanuyujyamānasya vā anyabhāgīyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati kaścid eva leśoddeśamātro dharma upātto bhavati bhikṣuś ca dveṣe pratiṣṭhed dveṣād
T02prmosubu:105: SA.10 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) yaḥ punar bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya
T02prmosubu:106: parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ samādhāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ -- mā tvam āyuṣman
T02prmosubu:107: samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramed bhedakaraṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ samādhāya pragṛhya tiṣṭha /
T02prmosubu:108: sametv āyuṣman sārdhaṃ saṃghena samagro saṃghasahitaḥ saṃmodamāno 'vivadamānaḥ ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ vihāraṃ tu niśṛja
T02prmosubu:109: tvam āyuṣman* idam evaṃrūpaṃ saṃghabhedakaraṇaṃ vastu /
T02prmosubu:110: evaṃ cet sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir ucyamānas tathaiva vastu samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhet*
T02prmosubu:111: śuddhas tu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ na ca pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyaḥ tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyujyamānaḥ samanuśiṣyamānas tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjet saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:112: SA.11 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) tasya khalu bhikṣor bhikṣavaḥ syur sahāyakāḥ
T02prmosubu:113: vyagravādinaḥ eko vā dvau vā saṃbahulā vā te tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeyuḥ --
T02prmosubu:114: mā yūyam āyuṣmantaḥ taṃ bhikṣuṃ kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā kiṃcid vadata tat kasmād dhetor dharmavādī āyuṣmanto bhikṣur vinayavādī ca so 'smākaṃ caiṣaś chandaṃ ca ruciñ cādāya tu vyāharati |
T02prmosubu:115: jānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate nājānan yac cāsya bhikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate ca asmākam api rocate ca kṣamate ca iti /
T02prmosubu:116: te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyā -- māyuṣmanta evaṃ vadantu na ca sa bhikṣur dharmavādī na vinayavādī adharmaṃ caiṣo
T02prmosubu:117: 'vinayaṃ cāsmākaṃ chandaṃ ruciñ cādāya tu vyāharati nājānaṃś ca sa bhikṣur bhāṣate jānaṃś ca yac cāsya bikṣoḥ rocate ca kṣamate ca tavāyuṣmato 'pi
T02prmosubu:118: saṃghabhedaḥ na rocate māyuṣmatām api saṃghabhedo rocate sametv āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghena samagro hi saṃgho saṃmodamāno avivadamāno ekāgradharmoddeśaḥ ekakṣīrodakībhūtaḥ śāstu darśayamānaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharantu /
T02prmosubu:119: tiṣṭha mā tvam āyuṣman saṃghabhedāya niḥsṛja imām evaṃrūpāṃ saṃghabhedakarāṃ kathām*
T02prmosubu:120: / evaṃ te bhikṣavo bhikṣubhiḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ
T02prmosubu:121: samanuśāsitavyās tasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:122: SA.12 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaṃ grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ
T02prmosubu:123: vā upaniḥśritya vihareyus te ca syuḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ teṣāṃ ca kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyeran vā śrūyeran vā prajñāyeran vā /
T02prmosubu:124: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- āyuṣmantaḥ kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ
T02prmosubu:125: yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi yuṣmākaṃ ca te pāpasamācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi prajñāyante 'pi prakramadhvaṃ āyuṣmantaḥ yūyaṃ asmād āvāsād alaṃ yuṣmākaṃ iha vāseneti /
T02prmosubu:126: evaṃ cet te bhikṣavas tān bhikṣūn vadeyuḥ -- chandagāmina āyuṣmantaḥ bhikṣava
T02prmosubu:127: dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti /
T02prmosubu:128: tatra bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ -- mā āyuṣmanta evaṃ vadata |
T02prmosubu:129: ekatya bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca evaṃrūpāyāḥ āpattyāḥ ekatya bhikṣūn pravāsayanty ekatya bhikṣūn na pravāsayantīti /
T02prmosubu:131: neme bhikṣavaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca āyuṣmanta khalu kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kulāni duṣṭāni dṛśyante 'pi
T02prmosubu:132: śrūyante 'pi pāpakāś ca yuṣmākaṃ samācārā dṛśyante 'pi śrūyante 'pi
T02prmosubu:134: bhikṣava āyuṣmantaś chandagāmino dveṣagāmino mohagāmino bhayagāminaś ca -- niḥsṛjata imām evaṃrūpāṃ kathām* /
T02prmosubu:135: te bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyāḥ -- evaṃ cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ
T02prmosubu:136: no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyās tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyāḥ samanuśāsitavyāḥ pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjeyuḥ saṃghāvaśeṣaḥ /
T02prmosubu:137: SA.13 (PrMoSū_Mū-Banerjee) bhikṣur iha kaścid durvācyasvabhāvo bhavati uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti -- mā mām āyuṣmantaḥ yūyaṃ kiṃcid vadata kalyāṇam akalyāṇaṃ vā aham api āyuṣmataḥ na kiṃcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam akalyāṇaṃ vā viramantu āyuṣmantaḥ mama vacanād
T02prmosubu:138: aham api viraṃsyāmi yuṣmākaṃ vacanād iti /
T02prmosubu:139: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ syād vacanīyo -- āyuṣman uddeśyaparyāpannaiḥ śikṣāpadaiḥ
T02prmosubu:140: sugatasūtraparyāpannaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ sahadharmeṇa sahavinayenocyamāna ātmānam tvaṃ avacanīyaṃ karoṣi āyuṣman vacanīyam eva ātmānaṃ karotu āyuṣmantam bhikṣavo sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vadantu āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn sahadharmeṇa sahavinayena vadatu evaṃ saṃbaddhā hi tasya bhagavataḥ tathāgatasya arhato samyaksaṃbuddhasya pariṣad yad idaṃ anyonyavacanīyād anyonyāpattivyutthāpanād iti māyuṣman ātmānaṃ avacanīyaṃ karotu /
T02prmosubu:141: sa bhikṣur bhikṣubhir evaṃ bhāsitavyaḥ -- evaṃ ced tad vastu pratiniḥsṛjed ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet pratiniḥsṛjed dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyas tasya pratiniḥsargāya dvir api trir api samanuyoktavyaḥ samanuśāsitavyaḥ pratiniḥsṛjed tad vastu ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ no cet
